@HRCzarPHL @RCruzjrkenzo @BrookeM_Feldman I agree! This is why decisions and policy need to include everyone- including drug users! The goal is and will always be to be fair and inclusive for everyone and NOT a selected few.

There is a direct correlation between open-air drug markets & gun violence. And, unfortunately, Fairhill & Cambria is a host site for one of the biggest open-air drug markets in Philly.
